greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of Sum{k=1..infinity}{1/k^sigma(k)}
maple: for n from 1 by 1 to i do a:=a+1/n^sigma(n); od;
mathematica: Clear[s]; s[n_] := s[n] = RealDigits[ Sum[ 1/k^DivisorSigma[1, k], {k, 1, n}], 10, 86] // First; s[n=100]; While[s[n] != s[n-100], n = n+100]; s[n] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Feb 13 2013 *)
results.author: _Paolo P. Lava_, Jun 27 2011
